articles.description: President Joe Biden in his Wednesday farewell speech to the nation warned that American democracy was sliding into an “oligarchy” of tech billionaires. But even before Biden’s speech, the rising wealth gap in the United States — as well as in China — raised c…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Joe Biden in his Wednesday farewell speech to the nation warned that American democracy was sliding into an oligarchy of tech billionaires. But what exactly is an oligarchy?… [+2619 chars]
